languages.text: На заснеженной планете развернулось тошнотворное зрелище — сотни богомерзких мутантов бродили в загоне, оснащенном шипами, крючьями и прочими орудиями пыток, испытывая невыносимые муки тела и разума. Питаемый их агонией друкарский маяк вновь пробудил призму гемункула, указавшую координаты лавовой планеты в системе Нармер-IV.

On the snow-covered planet, a sickening sight unfolded as hundreds of ungodly mutants wandered in an enclosure equipped with spikes, hooks, and other instruments of torture, caught in the throes of unbearable agony of body and mind. The Drukhari beacon, fed by their torment, reawakened the Haemonculus's prism, which gave the coordinates of a lava world in the Narmer IV System.
languages.original_text: На заснеженной планете развернулось тошнотворное зрелище — сотни богомерзких мутантов бродили в загоне, оснащенном шипами, крючьями и прочими орудиями пыток, испытывая невыносимые муки тела и разума. Питаемый их агонией друкарский маяк вновь пробудил призму гемункула, указавшую координаты лавовой планеты в системе Нармер-IV.

The Drukhari beacon, fed by their torment, reawakened the Haemonculus's prism, which gave the coordinates of a lava world in the Narmer IV System.

languages.text: 在这颗冰雪覆盖的行星上，行商浪人看到了令人作呕的一幕：几百名可怜的变种人被困在了围栏之中，受到尖钉、钩子与其他刑具的折磨，承受着难以言说的肉体与精神痛苦。在受害者的折磨与苦难之中，血伶人的棱镜再次唤醒，展示了纳默四号星某个熔岩世界的坐标。
languages.original_text: On the snow-covered planet, a sickening sight unfolded as hundreds of ungodly mutants wandered in an enclosure equipped with spikes, hooks, and other instruments of torture, caught in the throes of unbearable agony of body and mind. The Drukhari beacon, fed by their torment, reawakened the Haemonculus's prism, which gave the coordinates of a lava world in the Narmer IV System.

traits.locale_text: 在这颗冰雪覆盖的行星上，行商浪人看到了令人作呕的一幕：几百名可怜的变种人被困在了围栏之中，受到尖钉、钩子与其他刑具的折磨，承受着难以言说的肉体与精神痛苦。在受害者的折磨与苦难之中，血伶人的棱镜再次唤醒，展示了纳默四号星某个熔岩世界的坐标。

languages.text: Sur la planète recouverte de neige, des centaines d'abominables mutants bardés de pics, de crochets et d'autres instruments de torture erraient dans un enclos, soumis aux affres de la souffrance aussi bien du corps que de l'esprit. La balise drukhari, nourrie par leur tourment, a permis de réveiller le prisme de l'hémoncule, qui a donné les coordonnées d'un monde de lave dans le système de Narmer-IV.
languages.original_text: On the snow-covered planet, a sickening sight unfolded as hundreds of ungodly mutants wandered in an enclosure equipped with spikes, hooks, and other instruments of torture, caught in the throes of unbearable agony of body and mind. The Drukhari beacon, fed by their torment, reawakened the Haemonculus's prism, which gave the coordinates of a lava world in the Narmer IV System.

traits.locale_text: Sur la planète recouverte de neige, des centaines d'abominables mutants bardés de pics, de crochets et d'autres instruments de torture erraient dans un enclos, soumis aux affres de la souffrance aussi bien du corps que de l'esprit. La balise drukhari, nourrie par leur tourment, a permis de réveiller le prisme de l'hémoncule, qui a donné les coordonnées d'un monde de lave dans le système de Narmer IV.

languages.text: En el planeta nevado, un espectáculo enfermizo esperaba. Cientos de blasfemos mutantes recorrían un recinto cubiertos de espinas, ganchos y otros instrumentos de tortura, debatiéndose en la agonía de las torturas sufridas por sus cuerpos y mentes. La baliza Drukhari, alimentada por su dolor, despertó el prisma del Hemónculo, que proporcionó las coordenadas de un mundo de lava en el sistema Narmer IV.
languages.original_text: On the snow-covered planet, a sickening sight unfolded as hundreds of ungodly mutants wandered in an enclosure equipped with spikes, hooks, and other instruments of torture, caught in the throes of unbearable agony of body and mind. The Drukhari beacon, fed by their torment, reawakened the Haemonculus's prism, which gave the coordinates of a lava world in the Narmer IV System.

Cientos de blasfemos mutantes recorrían un recinto cubiertos de espinas, ganchos y otros instrumentos de tortura, debatiéndose en la agonía de las torturas sufridas por sus cuerpos y mentes. La baliza Drukhari, alimentada por su dolor, despertó el prisma del Hemónculo, que proporcionó las coordenadas de un mundo de lava en el sistema Narmer IV.

languages.text: 雪に覆われた惑星では、吐き気を催す光景が広がっていた。トゲやフック、その他の拷問器具を身に着けた何百もの変異体が、耐えがたい肉体と精神の苦痛の真っ只中で囲いの中をさまよっていたのだ。拷問によって力を得たデュカーリは、ナルメル・IV星系のマグマ惑星の座標を示すハモンキュラスのプリズムを再び目覚めさせた。
languages.original_text: On the snow-covered planet, a sickening sight unfolded as hundreds of ungodly mutants wandered in an enclosure equipped with spikes, hooks, and other instruments of torture, caught in the throes of unbearable agony of body and mind. The Drukhari beacon, fed by their torment, reawakened the Haemonculus's prism, which gave the coordinates of a lava world in the Narmer IV System.

traits.locale_text: 雪に覆われた惑星では、吐き気を催す光景が広がっていた。トゲやフック、その他の拷問器具を身に着けた何百もの変異体が、耐えがたい肉体と精神の苦痛の真っ只中で囲いの中をさまよっていたのだ。拷問によって力を得たデュカーリは、ナルメル・IV星系のマグマ惑星の座標を示すハモンキュラスのプリズムを再び目覚めさせた。

languages.text: Auf dem schneebedeckten Planeten bot sich ein grauenhafter Anblick. Hunderte von abscheulichen Mutanten wanderten in einem Ferch umher, der mit Stacheln, Haken und anderen Folterinstrumenten versehen war. Die Kreaturen waren gefangen in einer Hölle der unerträglichen körperlichen und seelischen Qualen. Der Drukhari-Sender, von ihrer Pein gespeist, erweckte das Prisma des Haemonculus wieder zum Leben. Dieses gab daraufhin die Koordinaten einer Lavawelt im System Narmer IV preis.

The Drukhari beacon, fed by their torment, reawakened the Haemonculus's prism, which gave the coordinates of a lava world in the Narmer IV System.

languages.text: Karla kaplı gezegende mide bulandırıcı bir manzara ile karşılaşıldı: Yüzlerce sefil mutant, dikenlerle, kancalarla ve daha birçok işkence gereciyle donatılmış, kapalı bir alanda dolanıyor, hem bedenen hem de zihnen dayanılmaz sancılara maruz kalıyordu. Onların ızdırabından beslenen Drukhari parıldağı, prizmayı yeniden uyandırdı. O da Narmer IV Sistemi'ndeki bir lav dünyanın koordinatlarını açık etti.
languages.original_text: On the snow-covered planet, a sickening sight unfolded as hundreds of ungodly mutants wandered in an enclosure equipped with spikes, hooks, and other instruments of torture, caught in the throes of unbearable agony of body and mind. The Drukhari beacon, fed by their torment, reawakened the Haemonculus's prism, which gave the coordinates of a lava world in the Narmer IV System.
